My problem is as you said...the BS, like "you'll go crazy if you try to spe=
ak with the dead." He has no real evidence to back that statement up. It is=
 purely just his belief.

If he said, "In my opinion...." or " I believe...=
" then I would still disagree, but it wouldn't put a burr under my blanket =
LOL!

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Misty Dawn 
  To: EVP-ITC@yah=
oogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, September 26, 2009 7:41 PM
  Subject: Re: [=
EVP-ITC] Anyone else offended by C2C?


    This is why I tell everyone don=
't take my word for it try it for yourself. Communication with something be=
yond yourself is a personal endeavor. Stephen Rorke makes his living on hoa=
x news and to him this is news. I can't blame anyone for questioning the re=
ality around them. But I can take a look at what else a person has had to c=
ontribute to the world and the feild of study they claim to be in.  I sugge=
st you all do the same before you take someones ideas and make them your ow=
n. He has a right to form his own opinion, experiment and get his own resul=
ts, and believe whatever he wishes. But so do I.

        Based on my own e=
xperiments, my own results, my own experiences, I form MY own opinions and =
beliefs. As for the spiricom communication device all I can say is its inte=
resting but I was not there, I did not experiement with it, I have no resul=
ts with which to base an opinion on. All we have left is some recorded data=
, and heresay.

        As for Frank's box and Sweep Tuning I can say I hav=
e seen the results, I have experimented with ST myself and I have received =
some astounding results which are message communications that are outside o=
f my own knowledge and my own ability to control or create. I have used man=
y methods for EVP and ITC and have had many interesting results that have b=
een confirmed, recognized, and proved beyond a shadow of MY own doubt. This=
 is MY personal experience and I invite anyone who wishes to know more to t=
ry it for themselves and get their own results rather than waste time tryin=
g to pick apart others ideas, theories or results. I never try and prove an=
ything to anyone else because for each of us it takes that one very persona=
l experience to have that eye opening moment and realize that there is more=
 around us than what is apparent.

        So no I am not offended by anyth=
ing anyone has to say as long as they base thier statements on truth rather=
 than BS. And we all know there are alot of people who make their life revo=
lve around the BS as well as try to profit from it.

        My best advice=
 would be to try it in depth before you form an opinion. Your results may d=
iffer from others, your personal experience may not be the same but that is=
 YOUR experience, not mine, to explore further.

        My journey has bee=
n quite fascinating, educational, and enlightening. I could only hope that =
everyone else has a similar path, but we each have our own roads to travel.=


        Misty


        --- On Sat, 9/26/09, purplespacefriend <purpleali=
engirl@...> wrote:


          From: purplespacefriend <purplealiengi=
rl@...>
          Subject: [EVP-ITC] Anyone else offended by C2C?
   =
       To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
          Date: Saturday, September 26, =
2009, 8:29 PM


            
          Art Bell was filling in, and he had =
a guest that supposedly worked with Spiricom. The bottom line was the guy t=
hought Spiricom was faked and he used that as a way of implying all EVP was=
 faked, at least that's the way I took it, and he connected the boxes to Sp=
iricom, implying they also did not work. Not only that, it was implied that=
 if one speaks to the dead, one goes insane! I was out raged! As usual thou=
gh Art Bell, and C2C never answer e-mails, and continue to act like they ar=
e the last word on anything paranormal, turning into more of debunking agen=
cy than anything informative. The thinking of the listeners, I think, is be=
ing carefully guided and manipulated. Radio remains only good for a source =
of raw audio, and not any meaningful information or dialog. 

          The=
se "researchers" /debunkers never check any facts, never check with anyone =
that makes or uses the equipment, they just pass their opinions off as fact=
s. If they actuyally honelstly tested this technology they would be singing=
 a different tune, but I supposed they are not paid to be honest. 

       =
   Frank-S
